phrases: Ask the customer what is the reason they are unable to log in?

Forgotten [glossary:User ID]
Forgotten Password
Forgotten Both

Other

Which online service are you trying to sign in to?
Self Assessment

Do you have your password?
Yes

[glossary:agent]

Ask the customer if they have their [glossary:UTR] number
Do you have your [glossary:UTR] number?
Tell the customer if they have their UTR we are able to re-issue their user ID online -we will send the User ID to the email address we hold on their Self Assessment account

If you have your Unique Tax Reference please tell us how you want us to re-issue your User ID
- email - we'll send your user ID to the address on your Self Assessment account
- post - we'll send your user ID within 7 days to the address on your Self Assessment account
Tell the customer if they have their UTR we are able to re-issue their user ID by post - we will send the User ID within seven days to the address we hold on their Self Assessment account

Tell the customer if they do not have their UTR or they have changed their email or postal address we need to transfer them to an advisor.

Tell the customer if they do not have the UTR number we need to transfer them to an advisor
If you don't have your UTR I'll need to transfer you to an adviser. Same comment as above.
Tell the customer if they have their password they can use our lost user ID service for the Agent account
If you have your password you can use our Agent's lost user ID service.
Tell the customer if they have their password they can use our lost user ID service for their Organisation account
If you have your password you can use our lost user ID service for organisations
Ask the customer what type account they have?
What type of online account do you have?

Tell the customer if they require urgent access to their account they can they use the [glossary:Gov.uk verify ] service. this will ask them a series of questions related to their financial history to confirm their ID

If you require urgent access to your account you can use the [glossary:Gov.uk verify ] service to sign in. This service will ask you to provide information from official documents and possibly some questions about your financial situation to verify your identity.
Tell the customer if they require urgent access to their account they can they use the [glossary:Gov.uk verify ] service. if they do not have these details to hand we can send their ID by post.
If you don't want to use the GOV.UK Verify service, we can send your user ID by post. We'll send it within 7 days to the address on your Self Assessment account.

Tell the customer if they require urgent access to their account they can they use the [glossary:Gov.uk verify ] service. we will send the User ID by post within seven days to the address we hold on their Self Assessment account.

If you require urgent access to your account you can use the [glossary:Gov.uk verify ] service to sign in. This service will ask you to provide information from official documents and possibly some questions about your financial situation to verify your identity. We'll send your user ID by post within 7 days to the address on your Self Assessment account.

Lost password and user ID
Ask the customer if they have received an access code?
Did you receive an access code?
Ask the customer what is the issue they are having

Please select one of the following to tell tell us more about your problem  
- error message received after submitting the access code
- difficulties with the identity verification
- neither of these
Error message after entering the access code
Problem with ID verification process
Tell the customer to select 'get help with this page' on the page that is displaying the error
If you select the 'get help with this page' link on the page where you were having difficulties, you'll be able to report the problem. It can take us up to 48 hours to respond.
Tell the customer they will hear back in 48 hours
see box above

Did you enter your date of birth correctly?

Did you get to the next screen after you'd entered your personal details?
Has the customer be able to enter their details and progressed to the next stage

- yes

Tell the customer they can now update their phone number online
If you've changed your phone number you can amend this by selecting the link 'I don't have access to that phone' . You'll find the link under the access code box
Tell the customer click the link under the access code box 'I don't have access to that phone'
see text above
Ask the customer if they requested their user ID before [timescale:2 weeks:date_ago] for a UK based customer
If you're based in the UK, did you ask us to re-issue your user ID before [timescale:2 weeks:date_ago] ? KC says - for this box and next 2 is it ID re-issue?
Ask the customer if they requested their user ID before [timescale:3 weeks:date_ago] for a customer based outside of the UK.
If you're not based in the UK, did you ask us to re-issue your user ID before [timescale:3 weeks:date_ago]? KC says - see comment above
Did the customer request before the dates shown above?
Ask the customer if they changed their address within 72 hours of requesting the user ID?
Did you change your address within 72 hours of asking us to re-issue your user ID? KC says - see comment above
Tell the customer changes to address can take up to 72 hours
It can take up to 72 hours for the system to update after a change of address.
Tell the customer they need to allow this time for our systems to update
You need to allow this time for our systems to update KC says - this feels patronising when written surely if we tell them it takes 72 hours they know they need to wait that long?
Tell the customer they will need to submit another request for the user ID to be sent out by post
Unfortunately it looks like you'll need to submit another request for your user ID to be posted to you.
Tell the customer we need to transfer them to an advisor (OSH) ?
We need to transfer you to an adviser (OSH) KC says - don't quite understand the logic of this bit will need to look at journey.
Tell the customer it can take up to 2 weeks to receive their user id by post if sent to a UK address.
It can take up to 2 weeks for you to receive your user ID by post if it was sent to a UK address.
Tell the customer it can take up to 3 weeks to receive their user id by post if sent to a non UK address.
It can take up to 3 weeks for you to receive your user ID by post if it was sent to a non-UK address.
Tell the customer to get back in touch if they do not receive the user ID after these times.
If you don't receive your user ID after this time. Please contact us.
Ask the customer if they have tried to log in more than three times?
Have you tried to sign in more than 3 times?
Tell the customer if they have entered an incorrect password 3 times they will have been automatically locked out
If you've entered your password incorrectly more than 3 times the system will lock you out. You'll have wait 2 hours before you try and sign in to your account again.
Tell the customer if they have entered an incorrect password 3 times to allow 2 hours and then try logging into their account again.
If you've entered your password incorrectly more than 3 times the system will lock you out. You'll have wait 2 hours before you try and sign in to your account again.
